body:
This is a redo of #14082 with a cross-check of version ranges from nbconvert github.

* `@4.0:5.1.1` : any version of jupyter_client
* `@5.2.1:5.5.0`: `jupyter_client >= 4.2`
* `@5.6.0:6.0.0a0`: `jupyter_client >= 5.3.1`

Also in 6.0.0a0 they drop support for Python 2, but since it is not in spack (and is a pre-release), I won't change it in this PR.
title: Fix py-jupyter-client version ranges in py-nbconvert
